docviewjs unitests - default theme

left side shows live controls, right side shows reference images and/or behaviour description, browser console displays errors if some unitest fails

IE9 exceptions spinner annimation doesn't work, text selection works everywhere.

TabStrip
Only inactive tab should have difference in hover state. Inactive tabs have pointer cursor, other tabs have default cursor. Text selection shouldn't work. Clicking on a tab should activate it (even the disabled ones).
ViewSwitch
Should alternate between View 1 and View 2 each second (no black border).
TabView
Should alternate between View 1 and View 2 each second (no black border). Clicking on inactive tab should display the appropriate box.
Accordion
Only inactive titles should have difference in hover state. Inactive titles have pointer cursor, other titles have default cursor. Text selection shouldn't work for the titles. Clicking on collapsed title should expand the contents while collapsing the previously expanded item, clicking again should collapse the item (even the disabled ones).
Accordion (live)
Should alternate between View 1 and View 2 each second (no black border). Clicking on inactive title should display the appropriate box.
HtmlArea
Should display a text selection cursor, should be able to select text.
HtmlArea2
The third table should highlight rows on mouse over.
HtmlArea3
HtmlArea4
HtmlArea5
Second row has darker mouse over state.
Txt
Should display default cursor, no text selection.
Spinner
Supposed to spin clockwise.
Label
Hover the image for tooltip. Should display default cursor, text selection is disabled.
Img
Hover the image for tooltip
StockImg
Hover the small icon for tooltip
All stock images
Layout.Vertical
Layout.Vertical - hfill
Layout.Horizontal
Layout.Horizontal - vfill
